step_feedback.feedback: Great job stretching your arm overhead! Ensure you feel that gentle resistance to help with lymph flow.
Excellent! Keep your palm and fingers wide open in this step.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. This is key for pumping.
Perfect! Open your hand and relax as you exhale. Keep visualizing that fluid moving.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm overhead, open your hand wide, then make a fist while breathing in. Finally, open your hand and relax as you breathe out. Keep up the good work!
